programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.desc: The defending champion Panthers visit the Hurricanes for Game 1 of the Eastern Conference finals. Florida advanced to its third straight Stanley Cup semifinal with a 6-1 victory over Toronto in Game 7. Carolina ousted Washington in five games.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.desc: The Hurricanes try to level their series with the Panthers in Game 2 of the Eastern Conference finals. Florida converted two of its three power-play opportunities in Game 1 and Sergei Bobrovsky stopped 31 shots to secure a 5-2 victory over Carolina.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Carolina Hurricanes at Florida Panthers
programme.desc: The Panthers return home with a 2-0 series lead for Game 3 of the East final against the Hurricanes. Florida seized control with a 5-0 victory in Game 2. Conn Smythe Trophy contender Sergei Bobrovsky (FLA) recorded his third shutout this postseason.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Carolina Hurricanes at Florida Panthers
programme.desc: The Panthers try to blow away the Hurricanes in Game 4 of the East final. Defending Stanley Cup champion Florida broke a 1-1 tie with five goals in a 9:08 span of the third period en route to a 6-2 triumph in Game 3, and a commanding 3-0 series lead.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Carolina Hurricanes
programme.desc: The Hurricanes head back home to host the Panthers for Game 5 of the Eastern Conference finals. Frederik Andersen made 20 stops for his second shutout of the postseason as Carolina staved off elimination with a 3-0 victory over Florida in Game 4.
